p:
The LTO (Li 4Ti 5O 12) is an active material that is being considered for application in Li-ion batteries
53 . This material does not form a solid electrolyte interface (SEI) layer because its working voltage occurs at a sufficiently high potential (1.55â€‰V vs. Li/Li +). Moreover, the LTO qualifies as a zero-strain material because it remains stable during the insertion/deinsertion of lithium
54 . Similar to the LFP, the LTO is a relatively inexpensive material and therefore a perfect candidate for the production of low-cost batteries.
